as_at_date.title: As at Date
as_at_date.description: The date when this financial record was calculated

financial_year.title: Financial Year
financial_year.description: The financial year in which these figures relate to

actual_budget_plan.title: Actual/Budget/Plan
actual_budget_plan.description: A category value to indicate if the figure represents actual, budgeted or planned values

category.title: Category
category.description: The category represents the organisational branch for this financial measure

sub_category.title: Sub Category
sub_category.description: Whether the line item is a current or non-current liability (current line items are within next 12 months, non-current is longer than 12 months)

title.title: Title
title.description: The category of type for classifying this line item

total_funding_000.title: Total Funding ($,000)
total_funding_000.description: The actual value in thousands of this line item
